metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17967 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-28 has a memory leak vulnerability in ReadBGRImage in coders/bgr.c.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> large backport sespiros> Due to the low severity of this issue and the risk of regression, we will not be fixing it for xenial and bionic

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
